tool_description: Matches job skill requirements with technician capabilities and certifications to determine compatibility scores for optimal assignment.

required_skills.description: List of skills required for the job

required_certifications.description: List of certifications required for the job

technician_ids.description: List of technician IDs to evaluate

technician_skills.description: Comma-separated skills for each technician (parallel to technician_ids)

technician_certifications.description: Comma-separated certifications for each technician (parallel to technician_ids)

experience_weights.description: Experience level weights for each technician (0-1 scale)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: technician_ids, technician_skills, and other technician arrays must have equal length
Empty required skills: At least one required skill must be specified
Invalid experience weight: Experience weights must be between 0 and 1
Invalid technician data: Each technician must have valid ID and skills data
usage: Provide job skill requirements and technician profiles to receive compatibility scores indicating how well each technician matches the job requirements.

best_match_id.description: ID of the best matching technician

best_match_score.description: Compatibility score of the best match (0-100)
